mdRecord.dcterms:title: U.S. Army uniform shirt and tie from World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This uniform was worn by Ruth Beery, head nurse of the 8th Evacuation Hospital unit of the U.S. Army, during World War II. Khaki colored shirt with maroon tie; shirt: plastic buttons, (2) flap breast pockets, Saks Fifth Avenue, U508 11 36 stamped on inside, Ruth Beery sewn; tie: Shillito's Men's store, Cincinnati, 11-21 tacked on inside, Ruth Beery sewn.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Uniforms
World War, 1939-1945
United States. Army. Evacuation Hospital, 8th
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
